news.title: KappaBox LIVE
news.content:
# Welcome to KappaBox LIVE. A Set of Jackbox Mods that RainbowKappa and others made!

These mods were made around others' communities but can be enjoyed by anyone.

Enjoy!

news.title: Join our Discord server!
news.content:
# You need help? Wanna play some games?

Join our Discord server! We also host documentation on what we used to make our mods.

<https://discord.gg/qwbmsernmg>

news.title: Trivia Beta64 Party Mod Fully Released!
news.smallDescription: The final version of the Beta64 inspired Trivia Murder Party 2 Mod is out!
news.content: # Released on July 27th, 2022! The final version of Trivia Beta64 Party featured a whole new overhaul to the game's Voice Acting!
